descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][color=#ff7700]Shehai
[/color][/b][/size][color=#ffff00]The Shehai is a Mystical sword manifested from ones own spirit. The sword singers of hammerfell managed to harness a energy not unlike the Thu'um to summon such weapons. If you are a Redguard dedicated truly to the way of the sword - This mod is for you.[/color]

[size=5][color=#660000]Mechanics
[/color][/size][size=4][color=#ffff00]-Lasts for 120 Seconds
-Remains active after being sheathed
-Based Off Ebony Greatsword
-Swing Speed 1.00

[size=5][color=#ff00ff]Location
[size=3][color=#ffff00]Can be purchased at the riverwood trader in whiterun hold.[/color][/size]
[/color][/size][/color][/size]
author: ShadowOfGodless
